general_advisory: Considering the above prediction, weather conditions in the next five days are likely to be favorable for sowing. Prevailing weather conditions favor the incidence of sucking pest. Farmers are advised to monitor insect pests in standing crops, apply necessary plant protection chemicals, resume agronomic practices, and apply fertilizers in standing crops. Ideal time to transplant seedlings of chilli, brinjal & early cauliflower in raised beds with proper drainage. Various preventative measures for crop protection and soil enhancement are advised.
